# Port information
#
# Unlike DATASET and CONTRIBUTORS, this is a tabular (comma-separated) data file
#
# Port: Port number, generally 1-8 or 1-16 for the LI-8150
# Treatment: "None" or experimental manipulation
# Species [optional] and other fields: plant species, soil information, etc.
#
# If there is no multiplexer, use a single line with "0" for the port number
#
Port,Treatment,Species
1,None,
2,None,
3,None,
4,None,
5,None,
6,None,
7,None,
8,None,
